languages.text: "Серьезнее не сыщешь, ваш-благородие! Слыхали, может, про Пустотное братство? Так кличут самый большой союз пиратов в Просторе. Вожака, конечно, у него нет, но есть крайне серьезные капитаны, которые решили, что резать друг другу глотки за добычу, это, как его, контрпродуктивно. А вот резать глотки, так сказать, совместно — антиконтрпродуктивно!"

traits.locale_text: "Серьезнее не сыщешь, ваш-благородие! Слыхали, может, про Пустотное братство? Так кличут самый большой союз пиратов в Просторе. Вожака, конечно, у него нет, но есть крайне серьезные капитаны, которые решили, что резать друг другу глотки за добычу, это, как его, контрпродуктивно. А вот резать глотки, так сказать, совместно — антиконтрпродуктивно!"

languages.text: "The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"
languages.original_text: "Серьезнее не сыщешь, ваш-благородие! Слыхали, может, про Пустотное братство? Так кличут самый большой союз пиратов в Просторе. Вожака, конечно, у него нет, но есть крайне серьезные капитаны, которые решили, что резать друг другу глотки за добычу, это, как его, контрпродуктивно. А вот резать глотки, так сказать, совместно — антиконтрпродуктивно!"

There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

"The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

languages.text: «¡La que más, Su Nobleza! ¿Ha oído hablar de la Hermandad del Vacío? Es la alianza pirata más grande de la Extensión. No tiene ningún líder al mando, claro está, pero sí capitanes extremadamente serios, que un día decidieron que rebanarse el cuello mutuamente por quién se llevaba el botín era ¿cómo decirlo? Contraproducente. Pero rebanar cuellos juntos... ¡eso sí que no era contraproducente!».
languages.original_text: "The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

traits.locale_text: «¡La que más, Su Nobleza! ¿Ha oído hablar de la Hermandad del Vacío? Es la alianza pirata más grande de la Extensión. No tiene ningún líder al mando, claro está, pero sí capitanes extremadamente serios, que un día decidieron que rebanarse el cuello mutuamente por quién se llevaba el botín era ¿cómo decirlo? Contraproducente. Pero rebanar cuellos juntos... ¡eso sí que no era contraproducente!».

languages.text: "Äußerst seriöse, Euer Erhabenheit! Habt Ihr schon einmal von den Gefährten der Leere gehört? Das ist das größte Piratenbündnis in der gesamten Ausdehnung. Es gibt natürlich keinen Anführer, aber einige fürchterlich seriöse Captains, die entschieden haben, dass es, wie nennt man das ... kontraproduktiv ist, sich gegenseitig wegen der Beute abzustechen. Aber gemeinsam andere abzustechen, tja, das ist anti-kontraproduktiv!"
languages.original_text: "The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

traits.locale_text: "Äußerst seriöse, Euer Erhabenheit! Habt Ihr schon einmal von den Gefährten der Leere gehört? Das ist das größte Piratenbündnis in der gesamten Ausdehnung. Es gibt natürlich keinen Anführer, aber einige fürchterlich seriöse Captains, die entschieden haben, dass es, wie nennt man das ... kontraproduktiv ist, sich gegenseitig wegen der Beute abzustechen. Aber gemeinsam andere abzustechen, tja, das ist anti-kontraproduktiv!"

languages.text: « Les plus sérieux possibles, Votre Noblesse ! Vous connaissez la Communauté du vide ? C'est la plus grande alliance de pirates de toutes les Étendues. Ils n'ont pas de leader, bien sûr, mais certains capitaines terriblement sérieux ont décidé qu'il serait, comment dire... contre-productif de se trancher mutuellement la gorge pour des histoires de butin. Mais trancher des gorges, de façon plus générale... Ça, c'est anti-contre-productif ! »
languages.original_text: "The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

traits.locale_text: « Les plus sérieux possibles, Votre Noblesse ! Vous connaissez la Communauté du vide ? C'est la plus grande alliance de pirates de toutes les Étendues. Ils n'ont pas de leader, bien sûr, mais certains capitaines terriblement sérieux ont décidé qu'il serait, comment dire... contre-productif de se trancher mutuellement la gorge pour des histoires de butin. Mais trancher des gorges, de façon plus générale... Ça, c'est anti-contre-productif ! »

languages.text: “最正经的那种，大人！您听说过虚空协联吗？科罗努斯扩区最大的海盗联盟。当然，协联没有首领，但有几个相当正经的舰长。他们觉得，如果为了争夺战利品打个没完没了，只会……怎么说来着……只会适得其反。可如果大家一起成群结伙去干架，那就适得其正了！”
languages.original_text: "The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

traits.locale_text: “最正经的那种，大人！您听说过虚空协联吗？科罗努斯扩区最大的海盗联盟。当然，协联没有首领，但有几个相当正经的舰长。他们觉得，如果为了争夺战利品打个没完没了，只会……怎么说来着……只会适得其反。可如果大家一起成群结伙去干架，那就适得其正了！”

languages.text: 「えらく真面目な奴らだよ、貴族様！虚空の仲間の話を聞いたことはあるかい？エクスパンス最大の海賊同盟さ。もちろんリーダーはいないんだが、やたらと真面目な船長が何人かいる。彼らは略奪品をめぐって互いに殺し合うのは…何て言ったかな…そう、非生産的だと判断したんだ。だが、共に略奪していけば…これぞ非・非生産的だとな！」
languages.original_text: "The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

traits.locale_text: 「超真面目な奴らだよ、貴族様！虚空の仲間の話を聞いたことはあるかい？エクスパンス最大の海賊同盟だよ。もちろんリーダーはいないが、やたらと真面目な船長が何人かいて、戦利品をめぐってお互いの喉を切り裂くのは…何だったかな…非生産的だと判断したんだ。だが、一緒に喉を切り裂けば…非生産的の逆さ！」
「えらく真面目な奴らだよ、貴族様！虚空の仲間の話を聞いたことはあるかい？エクスパンス最大の海賊同盟さ。もちろんリーダーはいないんだが、やたらと真面目な船長が何人かいる。彼らは略奪品をめぐって互いに殺し合うのは…何て言ったかな…そう、非生産的だと判断したんだ。だが、共に略奪していけば…これぞ非・非生産的だとな！」

languages.text: "En kerli ferlisinden soylu hazretleri! Uçsuz Kardeşliği'ni duymuş muydunuz? Enginlik'teki en büyük korsan ittifakıdır. Bir liderleri yok elbette ama ganimet için birbirlerinin boğazını kesmenin, nasıl derler, verimsiz olduğuna kanaat getiren son derece ciddi kaptanlar var. Birlik olup boğaz kesmekse verimsizliğin tam aksi!"
languages.original_text: "The most serious kind, Yer Nobleness! Have you heard about the Fellowship of the Void? It's the largest pirate alliance in the Expanse. There is no leader, of course, but there are some terribly serious captains who decided that cutting each other's throats over loot was — what do you call it — counterproductive. But cutting throats together — now that's anti-counterproductive!"

Birlik olup boğaz kesmekse verimsizliğin tam aksi!"
